ImyaTweaks.Title: Attractiveness settings for the Green_Mile Harbor Tree Objects per Session

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Set Value For Attractiveness Of Harbor Trees in OW MU
ImyaExpose.Description: Determines how many attraction points the Harbor Trees in the OW gives ( Mod default settings = 2 )

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Set Value For Attractiveness Of Harbor Trees in NW MU
ImyaExpose.Description: Determines how many attraction points the Harbor Trees in the NW gives ( Mod default settings = 2 )

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Set Value For Attractiveness Of Harbor Trees in Africa MU
ImyaExpose.Description: Determines how many attraction points the Harbor Trees in Africa gives ( Mod default settings = 2 )

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Set Value For Attractiveness Of Harbor Big Pots in all Sessions MU
ImyaExpose.Description: Determines how many attraction points the Harbor Big Pots in all Sessions gives ( Mod default settings = 2 )
